column4: hey guys ... i'm trying to talk to my VX8300 phone via a USB data cable and BitPim.  I can do it with sudo, but not as my normal user, because my normal user doesn't have permission to open the USB device.  where can i change that?
I'm already in all the groups Ubuntu thinks i should be (I'm the default user on a stock Gutsy install)
oh.. ok. not sure why then man. sorry
